document_data.name: Sterad
document_data.mainbody: '''Sterad''' was a warrior that lived in [[Vaasa]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He joined the famous expedition led by [[Vala Thorsdotter]], descendant of [[Bodvar the Black]], to seek out the whereabouts of [[Melegaunt Tanthul]] in [[Western Heartlands|the west]] during the early 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was a stealthy man and capable of sneaking up [[elven]] warriors, even within their own territory.
document_data.History: The Vaasan expedition ended when Vala and her fellow Vaasans arrived at the [[Greypeak Mountains]] on [[Nightal 20]] in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}. Raven remained with the group during their initial encounter with [[elves]] of the [[Tomb Guard]], an attack from a [[phaerimm]] behind the [[Sharn Wall]], and onward as they entered into the city of [[Evereska]].
